description:
Chit-chan and Yeti have arrived from the Republic of Asnikul, and everyone is getting ready to throw a Christmas party! They start to exchange presents, but wait... Goma-chan and the mini Yeti, Curly Locks, are missing! It turns out they`re searching the town for something that Curly Locks dropped, but they`re so cute that everyone in town wants to hold them and take pictures of them! Who`s the surprising figure that shows up to save them from being crushed by everyone`s affection?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴマちゃんのクリスマス 後編
